Text:
Classification: Documentary
Genre: Family | Fitness | Medical
Status: TBD/On The Bubble
Network: Channel 4 ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Fridays at 09:00 pm
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: April 28, 2008
Episode Order: 10

Embarrassing Bodies is presented by Christian Jessen, Pixie McKenna and Priya Manickavasagar. The series features members of the public obtaining treatment and advice for unusual and embarrassing medical issues that they are too embarrassed to see their own doctor about. 
(http://www.tvrage.com/Embarrassing_Bodies)
